homepage.title: Car Rentals Cluj-Napoca
homepage.subtitle: Explore Cluj-Napoca with our wide range of rental cars. Easy booking, competitive prices, reliable service.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: Your trusted partner for car rentals in Cluj-Napoca and beyond
ourStory.description1: At Rent'n Go, we believe that every journey should be memorable. Founded with a passion for travel and a commitment to excellence, we've been serving the Cluj-Napoca community with reliable, affordable car rental solutions.
ourStory.description2: Whether you're exploring the historic streets of Cluj-Napoca, venturing into the beautiful Transylvanian countryside, or need a reliable vehicle for business, we're here to make your journey smooth and enjoyable.
ourStory.description3: Our carefully curated fleet of modern vehicles, combined with transparent pricing and exceptional customer service, ensures that your rental experience exceeds expectations every time.

reliability.description: Count on us for punctual service, well-maintained vehicles, and transparent pricing with no hidden fees.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: As Cluj-Napoca locals, we know the best routes and can provide insider tips for your travels.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional car rental experiences that empower our customers to explore with confidence, comfort, and peace of mind. We strive to be more than just a car rental service – we're your trusted travel partner.

0.question: What documents do I need to rent a car?
0.answer: You'll need a valid driver's license (held for at least 2 years), a credit card in your name, and a valid ID or passport. International visitors may need an International Driving Permit.

1.question: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
1.answer: The minimum age is 23 years old. Drivers under 25 may be subject to a young driver surcharge and have restrictions on certain vehicle categories.

2.question: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
2.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before your pickup time without any fees. Changes made within 24 hours may incur additional charges.

3.question: Is fuel included in the rental price?
3.answer: No, fuel is not included. You'll receive the car with a full tank and should return it with a full tank to avoid refueling charges.

4.question: Can I add an additional driver?
4.answer: Yes, additional drivers can be added. They must meet the same requirements as the primary driver and be present during pickup with valid documentation.

5.question: What happens if I return the car late?
5.answer: Late returns may incur additional charges. If you're more than 2 hours late, you'll be charged for an additional day of rental. Please contact us if you need to extend your rental.

6.question: Is insurance included in the rental price?
6.answer: Basic Collision Damage Waiver (CDW) and Theft Protection (TP) with an excess amount are typically included. We also offer optional insurance packages to reduce the excess or provide more comprehensive coverage.
